content: Create a ballad about oceans with exactly 80 words.

In the heart of the deep blue sea,
Where mysteries whisper and secrets lie.
The ocean sings its ancient song,
A ballad of time, beneath the sky.

Waves dance to the moon's soft glow,
Tides ebb and flow, in rhythm so pure.
Corals bloom in colors aglow,
A underwater garden, forever secure.

Sharks patrol with silent grace,
Dolphins leap, in joyful play.
Seals bask on rocky ledges,
While albatrosses soar, come what may.

But beneath the tranquil facade,
Lies a world of storms and strife.
Yet in its depths, life abounds,
A testament to nature's wondrous life.

So here's to the ocean, vast and wide,
May we cherish and protect, with pride.
